title: Final Smash Bros. Ultimate Direct Recap - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.01.18
description:
Get 30% off your subscription at http://lootcrate.com/games with promo code: GAMES

Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock to build your portfolio at http://games.robinhood.com

Jared and Greg run you through all news from Nintendo this morning.

00:01:44 - Housekeeping
IGNxKFxTaco Bell: Tomorrow. IGN.com. 2 p.m.
EXTRA LIFE IS SATURDAY! Extra Life 2018 is November 3rd! We’ll be streaming games and shenanigans for 24 hours as we raise money for Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals! Join or donate now: kindafunny.com/extralife
The Roper Report   -
00:06:35 - SUPER SMASH BROS ULTIMATE UPDATE 
00:21:19 - Site Apologizes, Donates for RDR2 Leak, Brian Crecente VAriety
00:29:20 - Switch Sales, GIB
00:29:52 - Sunset Overdrive Rated on PC, Sal Romano Gematsu
00:30:48 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:38:10 - With so many WII U games ported to the Switch there is still one glaring omission to me: Super Mario Maker. - Charles
00:41:15 - Do you (Greg) think that with all the major games that have come out recently that it has left you very minimal time to actually enjoy a game like Red Dead Redemption 2? - PhotoNerd15
00:42:52 -  - PhotoNerd15
00:48:14 - Squad Up: Ryan Heatman(PS4) - JustEty
00:49:25 - One of them rotatin’ segments: Bad PSN Name - HiMyNameIsRoe
00:51:14 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Andrea

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
